title: Welcome to the Pride event app!
message: Save this link to see all the updates!!!! 🏳️‍🌈

title: 🎶 NEW feature just dropped!
message: Request an interval song here in the app. Click menu > song request

title: 🗓️ 5 days to go!
message: We are so excited! Make sure you have your ticket in advance.

title: 🎨 Stalls now added!
message: Stalls and their activities now announced. Check out the stalls tab!.

title: On the countdown 🎉
message: 2 hours to go before doors open!

title: Welcome to Pride on Stage community hours!
message: Check out the programme and stalls tab to see what is going on where and when.

title: Starting now!😁
message: Join Micky Cooper on the acoustic stage for our panel discussion on Resilience

title: Snap a photo with our photo booth feature! 🤳📸
message: Click photo booth in the menu.

title: Our second talk show is starting now! Don’t miss it in the main foyer.
message: Post your questions in the Q&A tab of the app 🤔

title: Have you created your own flag yet?
message: Go and see the Over the Rainbow group in the Bragg level for their flag workshop🏳️‍🌈
